original_text: The people expected him to swell up or suddenly fall dead; but after waiting a long time and seeing nothing unusual happen to him, they changed their minds and said he was a god.
korean_text: 그들은 그가 붓든지 혹은 갑자기 쓰러져 죽을 줄로 기다렸다가 오래 기다려도 그에게 아무 이상이 없음을 보고 돌이켜 생각하여 말하되 그를 신이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: The people expected him to swell up
but after waiting a long time
and seeing nothing unusual happen to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 아무 이상한 일이 일어나지 않는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and said he was a god
